import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "./pictures/pomegranate.svg"; import { Formik, Field, Form } from "formik"; export default function Order({ orders, addOrder }) { const sleep = (ms) => new Promise((r) => setTimeout(r, ms)); const { id } = useParams(); const order = orders.find((orderr) => { return orderr.id === Number(id); }); return ( <> Order {id}
  • See Deals

Price: {order.price}

{order.description}

{ await sleep(500); alert( `Added ${order.title} to My Orders. \nThe chefs at ${order.restaurant} have been notified to do the following: ${values.notes}` ); document.getElementById("submit").disabled = true; }} > {() => (
